official_title: A bill to provide for a United States contribution to the Special Facility for Sub-Saharan Africa administered by the International Development Association.

summary.text: Amends the International Development Association Act to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to the Special Facility for Sub-Saharan Africa $450,000,000. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a United States contribution to the Special Facility for Sub-Saharan Africa administered by the International Development Association.
